parameter.name: endpointUrl
parameter.label: Endpoint URL
parameter.description: The URL of the Hayward API Server

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: User Name
parameter.description: The username to connect to the server.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The password to connect to the server.
